author: hansbak
msg: make selection on email address more accurate and show completion button on mytask list

author: mturk
msg: Rename retry_wait to retry_interval. It means exactly that; 'the interval between retries'

author: mturk
msg: When doing get_endpoint() try to return the connected endpoints first. In send_request() we were doing exactly this when we got the endpoint, so need for double cache lock.
